subject: RE: [junit] Running jUnit suites from maven
msgSnippet: Did you try: mvn test -Dtest=SomeTestSuite Alternatively I think you can use the include/exclude surefire-plugin options in your pom.xml. Scott
messageBody:
Did you try:



mvn test -Dtest=SomeTestSuite



Alternatively I think you can use the include/exclude surefire-plugin
options in your pom.xml.



Scott



________________________________

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
Jeff
Sent: Friday, November 21, 2008 10:06 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Running jUnit suites from maven



I have made jUnit 4 test suites and run them with maven from the command

line. Is there a readme on how to do this as part of the regular build?
Why doesn't maven run test suites automatically?

Jeff
